title: [Bug]: Password not saving & have to sign-in every time
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

When I would login before, it would save my login successfully if I ever restarted my PC or closed out the app. Now, every time I close it or restart my PC, I have to login again every single time. 

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.12.6

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Sign in to Teams
2. Close the application
3. I have to sign in again.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Sign in to Teams
2. Close the app
3. Don't need to sign in again until I'm forced to by my org (1 week)
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
